activities: AXIA Consulting provides human resource information system consulting services.  During these implementations AXIA may receive personal information as part of the data conversion efforts of the project.  In all cases this information is passed through a client provided secure file transfer site or secure email.  In the course of delivering services to its customers, AXIA processes data, including Personal Information, on behalf of its customers. In this context, AXIA acts as a data processor and does not control the data. AXIA processes Customer Data under the direction of its Customers, and has no direct control or ownership of the personal data it processes. Customers are responsible for complying with any regulations or laws that require providing notice, disclosure and/or obtaining consent prior to transferring the data to Workday for processing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: AXIA Consulting has a self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
